content: कटु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (टु|ट्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Pungent, acrid; (said of a {%rasa%} or flavour; the {%rasas%} are six; मधुर, कटु, अम्ल, तिक्त, कषाय, and लवण); <ls>Bg. 17. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Fragrant, exhaling strong odour; <ls>R. 5. 48.</ls> {@--3@} Ill-smelling, having a bad smell. {@--4@} ({%a%}) Bitter, caustic (words); <ls>Y. 3. 142.</ls> ({%b%}) Disagreeable, unpleasant: श्रवणकटु नृपाणामेकवाक्यं विवव्रुः <ls>R. 6. 85.</ls> {@--5@} Envious. {@--6@} Hot, impetuous. --टुः {@--1@} Pungency, acerbity (one of the six flavours). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of several plants. --टु {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A medical plant (कटुरोहिणी). --टु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} An improper action. {@--2@} Blaming, reviling, scandal.
